rows.label: tlk41100141_02_msg0001
rows.name:
In Invidia, there's a fruit called a
Black Pomegranate.

rows.label: tlk41100141_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Sometimes it's sweet, sometimes sour,
sometimes bitter... the taste changes
every time you eat one.

rows.label: tlk41100141_02_msg0003
rows.name:
When Vandham brought me here,
he gave me a Black Pomegranate.

rows.label: tlk41100141_02_msg0004
rows.name:
The one I had then was so astringent I spat it out.
And that old guy just laughed when he saw me.

rows.label: tlk41100141_02_msg0005
rows.name:
And then he just up and died on us...
This is why you can't trust adults.
